name: Translator Widget

screenshots.caption: detail icon of widget included in toolbar of Firefox
Translate text Selected in context menu

short_description:
Translate entire web pages with this convenient extension dedicated to the Firefox browser. There are more than 50 languages for translation of content from English to French, from China to Indonesia and more, with the ability to choose and upgrade options are included in this practical widget

==Installation==
1. Download add-on directly from your browser Firefox
2. Click on icon translate in toolbar of browser and then choose the languages to translate web pages
summary: a basic add-on for Firefox to translate the web pages
